channel.title: CVE Feed for ractf -- core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ractf -- core

item.title: CVE-2021-21329|2024-08-03T18:09:15.191Z -- ractf -- core
item.description: RATCF is an open-source framework for hosting Cyber-Security Capture the Flag events. In affected versions of RATCF users with multi factor authentication enabled are able to log in without a valid token. This is fixed in commit cebb67b.
